column4: hi i just started my computer and updated my breezy system (just security updates etc)  and then GDM gave an error message about some theme not found .. so i rebooted and now my computer will not start anymore... not even POST beep and nothing on screen.... is it dead? :/
all fans are spinning and theres no error beeps... just that screen wont start and system is not booting AT ALL
ok and if that doesnt work what do i do? probably the PSU?
